description: British tourist visiting Spain for the first time

questions.question: Hi RECO! I’ve just arrived in Madrid—could you recommend a cozy, authentic tapas bar near the city centre that’s friendly to English speakers?
questions.response:
• Taberna El Sur — tapas bar. https://www.google.com/maps/place/?q=place_id:ChIJiTGJRSomQg0RTD1MZa1RTnE
• Casa Alberto — tavern. https://www.google.com/maps/place/?q=place_id:ChIJi0vRVCkmQg0RhJD1GJk3jkU
English-friendly. More?

questions.question: Thanks! Do either of these take reservations, and what dishes should I absolutely try at each?
